biotools.summary: Overlapping genes (OG) in prokaryotic species are used in OGtree to construct genome phylogeny trees. Overlapping gene content and overlapping gene order of the whole genome is used for the distance based method of tree construction. OGtree2.0 is a web server that can be used to reconstruct genome trees of prokaryotes on the basis of overlapping genes in prokaryotic whole genomes.

bioschemas.name: OGtree 2
